Flow.description: Flow prompts for what customer information (address, phone an/or email) to change. Designed to run from Service Console
Flow.label: Update Customer Information

recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Info_from_Person_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Current Info from Person Account

recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Info_from_Person_Account_2
recordLookups.label: Get Current Info from Person Account 2

value.stringValue: We currently have you at the following address, what would you like to change it to?
Use this for billing address as well?
We currently have the following email for you. What would you like to update it to?
We currently have the following phone information for you. What would you like to update?
Thank you for providing us updated contact information. All our systems will be updated in the next 48 hours with this information.
What information would like to change; address, phone or email information?

fields.name: displayUnsupported
fields.fieldText: Unsupported object. Flow must run from Person Account, Contact or Case record. Edit the Flow to support your object.

value.stringValue: We will be updating the following information on your customer record.

fields.name: displayNewAddress
fields.fieldText:
New Address Information:

Street: {!vStreet}

City: {!vCity}

Postal Code: {!vPostal}

State/Province: {!vStateProvince}

Country: {!vCountry}

value.stringValue: Confirm you wish to make the update
